price: 15. Mayee, hubaal waxaa maalintaa laga xijaabi Rabbigood.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
